channel.title: Devo 2.7 Help with adding points
channel.description:
I'm making it so that when you kill NPC 237, you get a bassault point.
This is my code for it: [code] if (npcs[i].npcType == 237) { Player.bassault += 1; } [/code]
I put that in npchandler.java, under process(); I also declared [code] public int bassault; [/code] in Player.java
My error is: [code] .\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:488: non-static variable bassault cannot be refere nced from a static context Player.bassault += 1; ^ [/code]
Please, can anyone help?

item.title: Devo 2.7 Help with adding points
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
